title: Iranian envoy expresses condolence on security forces’ martyrdom in Bannu
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 16 (APP): Iranian Ambassador Dr. Reza Amiri Moghadam on Tuesday expressed his heartfelt condolences and sympathy to the government and people of Pakistan following the martyrdom of security forces in Bannu.
In his message, Dr. Moghadam prayed to Allah Almighty to bless the souls of martyrs and console the families who lost their loved ones.
He further said, “My prayers go out for the safe recovery of the injured.”
